description:
Smoothie King’s My Smoothie free iPhone App rewards you for the purchases you make at Smoothie King.  Earn King’s Reward Points for every purchase you make at Smoothie King and redeem them for smoothies, snacks and enhancers. By creating each smoothie with a purpose, Smoothie King makes it simple and pleasurable for you to achieve a healthy and active lifestyle. 

Features:  
REWARDS 
Earn, track, and redeem your King’s Reward Points  

PROMOTIONS 
Learn about limited time promotions and the latest happenings at Smoothie King 

GAMES  
Play the King’s Match & Win game once you check-in for the opportunity to win special offers 

STORE LOCATOR 
Find the stores nearest you, get directions, call, and share over Facebook and Twitter pages

NUTRITIONAL INFORMATION  
View nutritional information of our smoothies  

VITAMINS & SUPPLEMENTS 
Browse our Smoothie King brand nutritional products
releaseNotes:
Enhanced UI and personalization options   
Enhanced directions and navigation  
New menu and nutritional information functionality  
Receive push notifications whenever you receive coupons  
Application icon shows available coupon count  
All coupons and game prizes consolidated under the Coupons tab  
Enhanced integration with Twitter and Facebook  
Various bug fixes
